mapper.select: SELECT em.id AS maker_enterprise_id, m.id AS maker_id, e.id AS enterprise_id, m.phone_number, m.name, m.idcard_no, a.agreement_url, m.bank_card_no, m.bank_card_verify_status, a.sign_state, a.create_time FROM diyi_maker_enterprise em INNER JOIN diyi_maker m ON em.maker_id = m.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON e.id = em.enterprise_id INNER JOIN diyi_agreement a ON a.party_b_id = m.id WHERE em.bool_deleted = 0 AND m.bool_deleted = 0 AND e.bool_deleted = 0 AND a.bool_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'MAKERJOINAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'MAKERPEOPLE' AND em.enterprise_id = #{param1}

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, e.enterprise_name, e.id AS enterprise_id, a.agreement_no, m.name, a.sign_type, a.agreement_url, a.sign_state, a.create_time FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON a.party_a_id = e.id LEFT JOIN diyi_maker m ON m.id = a.party_b_id AND m.bool_deleted = 0 WHERE a.bool_deleted = 0 AND e.bool_deleted = 0 AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_a = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND a.party_b = 'MAKERPEOPLE' AND a.enterprise_id = #{param1}

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, s.id AS service_provider_id, a.agreement_no, a.sign_type, a.agreement_type, s.service_provider_name, a.agreement_url, a.create_time, a.sign_state FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider s ON a.party_b_id = s.id WHERE a.agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'SERVICEPEOPLE' AND s.id = #{param1}
AND a.agreement_no LIKE concat('%', #{param2}, '%')

SELECT m.id maker_id,m.avatar,m.maker_state, m.certification_state, m.name, m.video_audit, (SELECT IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = m.id AND a.agreement_type = 'MAKERJOINAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'MAKERPEOPLE') AS maker_join_agreement, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = m.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'MAKERPEOPLE') AS ent_mak_supplementary_agreement, (SELECT IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = m.id AND a.agreement_type = 'MAKERPOWERATTORNEY' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'MAKERPEOPLE') AS maker_power_attorney FROM diyi_maker m where m.bool_deleted = 0
AND m.name LIKE concat('%', #{param1}, '%')

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, a.agreement_no, a.agreement_url, a.create_time
, e.id AS enterprise_id, e.enterprise_name
, m.id AS maker_id, m.name AS maker_name
FROM diyi_agreement a
INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON e.id = a.party_a_id AND a.party_a = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND e.id = #{param1}
INNER JOIN diyi_maker m ON m.id = a.party_b_id AND a.party_b = 'MAKERPEOPLE' AND m.id = #{param2}
WHERE a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING'

SELECT e.id AS enterprise_id,e.enterprise_state, e.enterprise_name, (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEJOINAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE') AS enterprise_join_agreement, (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPRICEAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE') AS enterprise_price_agreement, (SELECT count(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_a_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_a = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE') AS ent_mak_supplementary_agreement, (SELECT count(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'SERENTSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE') AS ser_ent_supplementary_agreement, (SELECT IF(count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE') AS enterprise_promise FROM diyi_enterprise e WHERE e.bool_deleted = 0
AND e.enterprise_name LIKE concat('%', #{param1}, '%')

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, a.agreement_no, a.sign_type, a.agreement_type, a.agreement_url, a.create_time, a.sign_state
, s.id AS service_provider_id, s.service_provider_name
, e.enterprise_name
FROM diyi_agreement a
INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider s ON a.party_a_id = s.id AND a.party_a = 'SERVICEPEOPLE' AND s.id = #{param1}
INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON a.party_b_id = e.id AND a.party_b = 'ENTERPRISEPEOPLE' AND e.id = #{param2}
WHERE a.agreement_type = 'SERENTSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING'

SELECT s.id service_provider_id, s.service_provider_state, s.service_provider_name, (SELECT IF (count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_b_id = s.id AND a.agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_b = 'SERVICEPEOPLE') AS service_provider_join_agreement, (SELECT count(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.party_a_id = s.id AND a.bool_deleted = 0 AND a.agreement_type = 'SERENTSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' AND a.valid_state = 'VALIDING' AND a.party_a = 'SERVICEPEOPLE') AS ser_ent_supplementary_agreement FROM diyi_service_provider s where s.bool_deleted = 0
AND s.service_provider_name LIKE concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
SELECT agreement_url FROM diyi_agreement WHERE bool_deleted = 0 AND id = #{param1} LIMIT 1
